result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ga: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádála
result.orig: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádála
result.html: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ponchtml: ḋá nóiméad tar éis a naoi ṗléasc dara foirgneaṁ an lárionad trádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.

result.eng: The two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ga: bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an lárionad trádála trí thine
result.orig: bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an lárionad trádála trí thine
result.html: bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an lárionad trádála trí thineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ponchtml: ḃí ḋá ḟoirgneaṁ an lárionad trádála trí ṫineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.orig: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.html: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: ṫug túr ṫeas an lárionad trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
